## Description {#details}

The default (manual heuristics) implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a>.

This implementation does not need to keep state between inliner pass runs, and is reusable as-is for inliner pass test scenarios, as well as for regular use.

Definition at line 229 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/inlineadvisor-h">InlineAdvisor.h</a>.
